title: 07/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 07/12/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
With Colin off, Nick Wright fills in to discuss the Bucks win in game 3 of the NBA Finals and why Giannis Antetokounmpo reminds Nick of a young star quarterback in the NFL right now. He’s hesitant to consider Devin Booker a “superstar” in today’s NBA after a disappointing performance in the Finals and what it takes for him to get into that elite category. He also explains why Suns head coach Monty Williams needs to stop complaining about the officiating even though it’s actually a good strategy. Plus, NBA champion Antoine Walker joins the show to tell Nick Giannis should be considered the best player in the world right now.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
With Colin off, Nick Wright fills in to discuss the Bucks win in game 3 of the NBA Finals and why Giannis Antetokounmpo reminds Nick of a young star quarterback in the NFL right now. He’s hesitant to consider Devin Booker a “superstar” in today’s NBA after a disappointing performance in the Finals and what it takes for him to get into that elite category. He also explains why Suns head coach Monty Williams needs to stop complaining about the officiating even though it’s actually a good strategy. Plus, NBA champion Antoine Walker joins the show to tell Nick Giannis should be considered the best player in the world right now.
